title: Enhancing the inherent stability of perovskite solar cells through chalcogenide-halide combinations
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1368-1386
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03612J, Perspective
Cheng Wang, Riming Nie, Yiming Dai, Huanyu Tai, Bingjian Zhu, Luyao Zhao, Yong Wu, Wanlin Guo, Sang Il Seok
Perovskite solar cells have attracted much attention due to their rapidly increasing power conversion efficiency, however, their poor inherent long-term stability limits their commercialization.
